channel.title: Little help with this lol?
channel.description:
ok so you know how you setup SQLscape and ect i know all that ive set up the sql ddb and installed all that is req and i have added DB.sql to the ddb right... and edited lifescape.java and i go to compile it compiles fine no errors and creates every class file right and when i click run i get
[code] "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Lifescapeserver Press any key to continue . . ." [/code] and i checked to make sure the Lifescapeserver.java AND .class exist and they do but im not sure wtf wrong here..
and im using this code to run it [code] @echo off title SQLscape java Lifescapeserver -cp mysql-connector-java-5.0.5-bin pause[/code]
anyone know whats wrong?

item.title: Little help with this lol?
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

k thanks

EDIT: i just hadnt have goten java 6.0 and name stays same becos it name of a file…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2007, 05:15:57 PM[/size][hr]sorry bout this double but i still get this error anyone else help me?

item.title: Little help with this lol?
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

i think you need java 6.0 and the replace 5.0.5 with 6.0 …not sure but i think thats what the problem is
